title: ARK's Cathie Wood: ‘Private markets get it,’ but disruptive tech is beaten-up in the stock market - MarketWatch
content: ARK's Cathie Wood: ‘Private markets get it,’ but disruptive tech is beaten-up in the stock market  MarketWatch
description: When it comes to valuing disruptive innovation, private markets seem to understand the opportunity better than the stock market, according to Cathie Wood,...
